feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-09-06T03:59:29.064127Z; ; ; <作者>; <名称>;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;询问 HN：我是 FCC 专员，提议对物联网安全更新进行监管</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37392676</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37392676</ id>; <更新>;2023-09-05T15:59:15.421832Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37392676"/>; <作者>; <名称>;SimingtonFCC< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=SimingtonFCC</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;FCC 专员 Nathan Simington 讨论物联网设备安全更新的必要性以及 FCC 提议的网络安全标签计划。他鼓励个人向联邦通信委员会提出意见以支持该提案。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-im-an-fcc-commissioner-propusing-regulation-of-iot-security-updates" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37392676" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;斯诺登泄密十周年</stitle>; <id>;https://www. electrospaces.net/ 2023/06/on-10th-anniversary-of-snowden.html</id>; <更新>;2023-09-06T02:59:15.604062Z<​​/更新>; <link href="https://www. electrospaces.net /2023/06/on-10th-anniversary-of-snowden.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;nceqs3</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nceqs3</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEiyhZ8oMTZBwed-5n7dMj4FYGxNBxrR8NfDPbzx9Te6eeni5ePQDuNKSVPKfGm1TYMJTToHO19ZFzFVvLPJrgJ_yX PPbT06cJrAE7Nr2F5B_NoWy7aHGgdxlD6xqDPf4yy19JIbBk2TfBVZPPoiojdk039bRHMtNCmkzUuznUDeE24c_tEwqEhFaFH7/s600/10yearsnowden-header.jpg"样式="宽度：220px； height: 116px;" />;<br />;为了纪念斯诺登泄密事件开始 10 周年，本文回顾了一些最著名的泄密事件及其发展过程。与斯诺登爆料相关的档案，并讨论可能导致斯诺登泄露这些文件的动机。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#on-the-10th-anniversary-of-the-snowden-启示录" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37400526" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;LLM 可以从单个示例中学习吗？</stitle>; < id>;https://www.fast.ai/posts/2023-09-04-learning-jumps/</id>; <更新>;2023-09-06T00:59:15.606111Z</更新>; <link href=" https://www.fast.ai/posts/2023-09-04-learning-jumps/"/>; <author>; <name>;jdkee</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=jdkee</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.fast.ai/posts/2023-09-04-learning-jumps/2023-09 -04-09-00-35.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 142px;" />;<br />;最近，在针对多项选择科学考试问题对大型语言模型 (LLM) 进行微调时，研究人员观察到该模型能够在看到数据集中的示例后快速记住它们一次。这与先前关于神经网络样本效率的观点相矛盾。进一步的实验支持 LLM 能够快速记住输入的假设，这可能需要重新思考我们如何训练和使用 LLM。<a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#can-llms-learn-from-a-single-example" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =37399873" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= “text”>;Astro 3.0</stitle>; <id>;https://astro.build/blog/astro-3/</id>; <更新>;2023-09-06T01:59:15.606655Z</更新>; <link href="https://astro.build/blog/astro-3/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;adrian_mrd</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=adrian_mrd< /uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://astro.build/_astro/post-asset-1.497603c0.webp" style="width: 220px; height: 94px;" />;<br />;Astro 3.0 是第一个支持 View Transitions API 的主要 Web 框架。它将页面之间的原生浏览器过渡效果带入主流。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/#astro-3-0" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37378880" target="_blank">; [comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Cory Doctorow：互操作性可以保存开放网络</stitle>; <id>;https://spectrum.ieee.org/doctorow-interoperability</id>; <updated>;2023-09-06T00:59:15.607072Z</updated>; <link href=" https://spectrum.ieee.org/doctorow-interoperability"/>; <作者>; <名称>;pseudolus</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pseudolus</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://spectrum.ieee.org/media-library/a-partially-open-laptop-sits-on-top-of-opened-chains- and-padlocks.jpg?id=36341064&width=1200&height=775" style="width: 220px; height: 143px;" />;<br />;作者 Cory Doctorow 主张通过强制互操作性来颠覆大型科技公司，以此作为打破垄断并使互联网更加民主的一种方式。他提出，重申系统和平台之间的互操作性可以打破大公司. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cory-doctorow-interoperability-can-save-the-open-web" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37399799" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Bintracker：21世纪的chiptune音频工作站</stitle>; <id>;https://bintracker.org/</id>; <更新>; 2023-09-05T23:59:15.607547Z</updated>; <link href="https://bintracker.org/"/>; <author>; <name>;generic human </name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=generic human</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://bintracker.org/images/bt-screenshot-rev210319.png" style= “宽度：220px； height: 177px;" />;<br />;Bintracker 是一款目前正在开发的现代可编程 Chiptune 音乐编辑器。它支持各种音乐引擎和平台，并且可以通过插件和配置设置进行定制。<a href="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/#bintracker-a-chiptune-audio-workstation-for-the-21st- century" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=37377529" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;通过编写小程序来学习WebAssembly</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/EmNudge/wadlings</id>; <updated>;2023-09-05T16:59 ：15.607977Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/EmNudge/wadlings"/>; <作者>; <name>;todsacerdoti</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=todsacerdoti</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/600dc00da02d5e94f730be7a8dae2b5d5158d8d80ec19ad660fbf91cd10a2804/EmNudge/wattlings" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;该项目是一个不完整且积极开发的项目，旨在通过构建小程序来学习 WebAssembly。目标是提供结构化的学习体验，以最少的解释并强调编码。该项目鼓励一致接触语法并有意识地学习。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#learn-webassemble-by-writing-small-programs" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37393820" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如果可以使用开源，就可以构建硬件</stitle>; <id>;https://redeem-tomorrow.com/if -you-can-use-open-source-you-can-build-hardware</id>; <更新>;2023-09-05T17:59:15.608746Z</更新>; <link href="https://redeem- tomorrow.com/if-you-can-use-open-source-you-can-build-hardware"/>; <作者>; <name>;gustavo_f</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=gustavo_f</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://redeem-tomorrow.com/images/uploads/dsc00023.jpg" style="width: 220px ; height: 237px;" />;<br />;由于物理世界的限制，构建硬件产品非常复杂，但它从未像现在这样容易。借助微控制器板和开源代码，初学者可以快速开始探索硬件.使用 I2C 和方便的电缆标准可以轻松组合电子元件，无需焊接。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#if-you-can-use-open-source-you-can -build-hardware" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37395096" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Meta 的段任何用 C++ / GGML 编写的内容</ stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/YavorGIvanov/sam.cpp</id>; <更新>;2023-09-05T22:59:15.609144Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/github.com/YavorGIvanov/sam.cpp" com/YavorGIvanov/sam.cpp"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ariym </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ariym</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8558655/261301565-37b7bf4b-bf91-40cf-8ec1-1532316e1612.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;总结本文，它提供了有关如何将 PTH 模型转换为 GGML 格式并使用转换后的模型运行推理的说明。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat. io/#meta-s-segment-anything-writing-with-c-ggml" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =37398891" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= "text">;当部署变得简单时，代码就会变得更简单</stitle>; <id>;https://bitbytebit.substack.com/p/when-deployments-are-easy-code-becomes</id>; <updated>;2023 -09-05T20:59:15.609521Z</updated>; <link href="https://bitbytebit.substack.com/p/when-deployments-are-easy-code-becomes"/>; <作者>; <名称>; recroad</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=recroad</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn. com/image/fetch/w_1200、h_600、c_fill、f_jpg、q_auto：好、fl_progressive：陡峭、g_auto/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2Ffd9d73e7-1dc3- 4bc4-affd-f064ec992dc8_768x768.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 172px;" />;<br />;Launch Darkly、PostHog、Flagsmith 等功能标记工具是有成本的。它们为您购买了大量功能，如 A/B 测试、分阶段推出和减少部署需求。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#when-deployments-are-easy-code-becomes-simler" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37397323" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;deVStudio – 在 Android 上运行 VS Code</stitle>; <id>;https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=tech.ula.devstudio&hl =en_US</id>; <更新>;2023-09-05T20:59:15.609928Z</更新>; <link href="https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=tech.ula。 devstudio&hl=en_US"/>; <作者>; <名称>;userland_tech</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=userland_tech</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://play-lh.googleusercontent.com/zOz6jhPJYdnztn7MSYrIIASLVtr27RiDf5Ha-GA8PHODPS91cHg8YVmByrP76or58g=w526-h296-rw" style="宽度: 220px; height: 102px;" />;<br />;deVStudio 是一款 Android 应用程序，可让您在设备上运行 Visual Studio Code (VS Code)。它是一款功能齐全且得到专业支持的应用程序，运行 Linux 桌面版 VS代码。用户可以根据需要添加软件包和扩展来自定义应用程序。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#devstudio-runs-vs-code-on-android" target="_blank" >;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37397359" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：具有类型安全性的开源 Postman 替代方案</stitle>; <id>;https: //recipeui.com/</id>; <更新>;2023-09-05T18:59:15.610318Z</更新>; <link href="https://recipeui.com/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Volbohel </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Volbohel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://recipeui.com /opengraph-image.png" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;具有类型安全性的开源发布替代方案。向 ChatGPT、OpenAI、Nasa、Reddit 等发出无错误请求。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io /#show-hn-open-source-postman-alternative-with-type-safety" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=37393099" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;显示 HN：Puck – React 开源可视化编辑器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/measuredco/puck</id>; <更新>;2023-09-05T14:59： 15.610699Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/measuredco/puck"/>; <作者>; <name>;chrisvxd</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user ?id=chrisvxd</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/9441b239a6dd933bdeaf1f5ed94ae0136dc5e1205059caabea573dd9c73292a3/measuredco/puck" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Puck 是一个 React 组件，可以轻松集成到您现有的应用程序中。它可以配置为与插件一起使用并扩展其功能。<a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#show-hn-puck-open-source-visual-editor-for-react" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=37391848" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;通过函数式编程学习物理</stitle>; <id>;https://nostarch.com/learn-physicals-function-programming</id>; <updated>;2023-09-05T13:59： 15.611486Z</updated>; <link href="https://nostarch.com/learn-physicals-function-programming"/>; <author>; <name>;privong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=privong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://nostarch.com/sites/default/files/styles/uc_product/public/LearnPhysicsWithFunctionalProgramming_front .png?itok=vs2ta4kE" style="宽度: 220px; height: 292px;" />;<br />;本文是《用函数式编程学习物理》的书籍摘要。内容涵盖 Haskell 编程、牛顿力学、电磁理论等主题。 <a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#learn-physicals-with-function-programming" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37391161 " target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text ">;我们送走的人</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2023/09/disabled-children-institutionalization-history/674763/</id>; <更新>;2023 -09-05T20:59:15.612282Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2023/09/disabled-children-institutionalization-history/674763/"/>; <作者>; <name>;fortran77</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fortran77</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/vFR8IS7nzxmPuTwvFQJ8dKcRgaI=/0x0:2880x1620/1440x810/media/img/2023/08/03/Senior_Opener_NEW_2/original.png" style="width: 220px;身高： 124px;" />;<br />;一条带有不会说话的儿子照片的病毒式推文引发了许多不会说话和很少说话的孩子的父母的回复。作者反思了她自己家族中一位不说话的阿姨的隐秘历史，以及理解并同情父母的过去的重要性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-ones-we-sent-away" target="_blank">;[summary]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37385038" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;启动 HN：Nullstone (YC W22) – 部署和管理云应用程序的更简单方法</stitle>; <id>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37391272</id>; <更新>;2023-09-05T15:59:15.612662Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=37391272"/>; <author>; <name>;bsick7</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bsick7</uri>; </author>; <content type=" html">;Nullstone 是一个开发者平台，可简化云应用程序和基础设施的部署和管理。它为将任何类型的应用程序部署到 AWS 或 GCP 提供了直观的体验，具有自动机密管理、GitOps 和预览环境等功能。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#launch-hn-nullstone-yc-w22-an-easier-way-to-deploy-and-manage-cloud-apps" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37391272" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Intel 8088 测试套件</stitle>; <id>;https://martypc.blogspot .com/2023/09/a-test-suite-for-intel-8088.html</id>; <更新>;2023-09-05T18:59:15.614146Z</更新>; <link href="https:// martypc.blogspot.com/2023/09/a-test-suite-for-intel-8088.html"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/ user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEgyRXO6qRbUvN43SHYYZgsZzpM1bBqhlrsY-4_sE-Lt3yH9ud_XnlBuF5oZtS8SYEhpazks27FR1rNjIF sjLvBFr9KoBv9OExF6Y1RSC_RBya4NeoA-PxnzCtUMq3vhftKaz5YyWClwzXnCeYwfKa0RZSeCEEq8WuZ9Kl1B97KjGes_JvWt0fq- ls4VXQqd/w640-h360/test_rig01.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;本文讨论了如何使用硬件验证来确保模拟 Intel 8088 CPU 的准确性。它引入了 8088 CPU 的 JSON 测试套件的概念，并宣布为 8088 创建第一个完整的 JSON CPU 测试套件。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-test-suite -for-the-intel-8088" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37385447" target="_blank">;[ comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Mentra 旨在匹配神经分化的求职者有工作</stitle>; <id>;https://techcrunch.com/2023/09/05/sam-altman-backed-startup-aims-to-match-neurodivergent-jobseekers-with-ideal-jobs/</id >; <更新>;2023-09-05T17:59:15.614524Z</更新>; <link href="https://techcrunch.com/2023/09/05/sam-altman-backed-startup-aims-to-match -neurodivergent-jobseekers-with-ideal-jobs/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rntn</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rntn</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://techcrunch.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/FoundersPic-1-e1693865065662.jpg?w=712" style="width: 220px ; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Mentra是一个人工智能驱动的神经包容性就业网络，帮助大型企业雇用具有认知差异的员工。它根据神经类型、能力和环境敏感性等因素为雇主与人才进行匹配。该平台已与十几家公司签约，拥有超过 33,000 名神经发散型求职者的人才库。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mentra-aims-to-match-neurodivergent-jobseekers-with-jobs " target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37395168" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</ content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Klack – 每次按键都带来令人满意的声音</stitle>; <id>; https://tryklack.com/</id>; <更新>;2023-09-05T17:59:15.614899Z</更新>; <link href="https://tryklack.com/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;latexr</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=latexr</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn .tryklack.com/images/meta.png" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;每次击键都能发出令人满意的声音<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#klack-satisfying-sound-with-every-keylines" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37395370" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;通过身份验证技术保持对新闻摄影的信任</stitle>; <id>;https://www.reutersagency .com/authenticity-poc/</id>; <更新>;2023-09-05T21:59:15.615275Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.reutersagency.com/authenticity-poc/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rbanffy </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rbanffy</uri>; </作者>; <content type =“html”>;<img src =“ https://www.reutersagency.com/authenticity-poc/_ipx/w_1920/images/photos/device3%20-%20124A0699KJC.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;通过身份验证技术维护对新闻摄影的信任。佳能与路透社和 Starling Lab 合作开发了一种系统，可以对新闻摄影记者拍摄的图像进行数字签名和身份验证。经过身份验证的图像注册在公共区块链并保存在加密档案中，确保照片的完整性和真实性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#preserving-trust-in-photojournalism-through-authentication-technology" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37398317" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </条目>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;形成边缘</stitle>; <id>;https://www.scopeofwork。 net/forming-an-edge/</id>; <更新>;2023-09-05T19:59:15.615651Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.scopeofwork.net/forming-an-edge/ "/>; <author>; <name>;visviva</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=visviva</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://www.scopeofwork.net/content/images/2023/08/KnifeBevelsv1200x900v9-1.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 149px;" />;<br />;菜刀的锋利度对于切割的精度和一致性至关重要。钢材的锻造和硬化过程决定了刀的锋利度及其分子结构。刀的几何形状，包括边缘角度和形状，也对其切割手感和性能起着一定的作用。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#forming-an-edge" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37396479" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;什么是翻牌？</stitle>; <id>;https://nhigham.com/2023/09/05 /what-is-a-flop/</id>; <更新>;2023-09-05T18:59:15.616028Z</更新>; <link href="https://nhigham.com/2023/09/05/what -is-a-flop/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;RafelMri</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=RafelMri</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://nickhigham.files.wordpress.com/2020/12/cropped-200302-1351-14_9943_2979_rot_square_1600px.jpg?w=200" style="width: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;触发器是对浮点数进行的算术运算。它用于衡量数值计算的成本。计算所需的触发器次数是其成本的一种衡量标准. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-is-a-flop" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator .com/item?id=37389361" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml ">; <title type="text">;亚马逊如何使用混沌工程处理每秒 8 万个请求</stitle>; <id>;https://community.aws/posts/how-search-uses-chaos-engineering</id >; <更新>;2023-09-05T20:59:15.616406Z</更新>; <link href="https://community.aws/posts/how-search-uses-chaos-engineering"/>; <作者>; <名称>;jbredeche</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jbredeche</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://avatars .githubusercontent.com/u/3674210?v=4" style="width: 220px; height: 220px;" />;<br />;Amazon Search 将技术和文化相结合，为构建者团队提供支持，并通过混沌工程确保平台的弹性。混沌工程使团队能够尝试故障或负载以提高弹性。Amazon Search 提供 1,000 多个结果，并且每秒处理 84,000 个请求，展示了其 DevOps 实践和混沌工程的有效性。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-amazon-uses-chaos-engineering-to-handle-80k-requests -每秒" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37397405" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Bedframe – 开源浏览器扩展开发框架</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/nyaggah/bedframe</id>; <updated>;2023-09-05T16:59:15.616796Z</updated>; <link href="https:// github.com/nyaggah/bedframe"/>; <作者>; <名称>;JoeyDoey</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=JoeyDoey</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/284415/265586669-512540dd-18b7-4fbe-9ebe-861722b83a97.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 143px;" />;<br />;您的浏览器扩展开发框架。通过在 GitHub 上创建帐户来为 nyaggah/bedframe 开发做出贡献。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn- bedframe-open-source-browser-extension-development-framework" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37394194" target= "_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
